name: 8004-solana
description: TypeScript SDK for 8004 on Solana - Agent identity, reputation and validation

scripts.test:e2e:localnet: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' SOLANA_RPC_URL='http://127.0.0.1:8899' SOLANA_WS_URL='ws://127.0.0.1:8900' INDEXER_URL='http://127.0.0.1:3005/rest/v1' bunx jest --config jest.e2e.config.js tests/e2e-solana/01-identity-complete.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/02-reputation-complete.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/04-atom-engine-complete.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/05-security-attacks.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/06-indexer-api.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/07-v050-value-decimals.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/08-reputation-gaming.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/09-seal-v1-complete.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/10-collection-parent-complete.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/11-indexer-graphql-parity.test.ts --verbose --runInBand
scripts.test:e2e:all: bun run test:e2e:identity && bun run test:e2e:reputation && bun run test:e2e:atom && bun run test:e2e:security && bun run test:e2e:indexer && bun run test:e2e:seal
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:unit: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' bunx jest --config jest.config.js tests/security/input-rejection.test.ts tests/security/transaction-safety.test.ts tests/unit/transaction-builder-send.test.ts tests/unit/sdk-solana-extended.test.ts tests/unit/indexer-client-full.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:unit:strict: NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' bunx jest --config jest.config.js tests/security/input-rejection.test.ts tests/security/transaction-safety.test.ts tests/security/ssrf-protection.test.ts tests/unit/transaction-builder-send.test.ts tests/unit/sdk-solana-extended.test.ts tests/unit/indexer-client-full.test.ts tests/unit/feedback-manager-full.test.ts tests/unit/instruction-builder.test.ts tests/unit/programs.test.ts tests/unit/signing-full.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:e2e:strict: REQUIRE_ONCHAIN_WRITES=true NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' SOLANA_RPC_URL='https://api.devnet.solana.com' bunx jest --config jest.e2e.config.js tests/e2e-solana/e2e-sign-verify-wallet.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/e2e-validation.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/e2e-devnet-funded.test.ts --verbose --runInBand
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:coverage:strict: REQUIRE_ONCHAIN_WRITES=true NODE_OPTIONS='--experimental-vm-modules' SOLANA_RPC_URL='https://api.devnet.solana.com' bunx jest --config jest.e2e.config.js tests/e2e-solana/e2e-sign-verify-wallet.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/e2e-validation.test.ts tests/e2e-solana/e2e-devnet-funded.test.ts --coverage --verbose --runInBand
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness: bun run test:mainnet:readiness:unit && bun run test:mainnet:readiness:e2e
scripts.test:mainnet:readiness:strict: bun run test:mainnet:readiness:unit:strict && bun run test:mainnet:readiness:e2e:strict
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run lint

author: QuantuLabs
